article.title: Maryland Firm to Support Irregular Warfare
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Research and Engineering Development LLC, Lexington Park, Maryland, is being awarded a $19,986,247 contract modification for acquisition, engineering, analysis, development and integration services in support of irregular warfare efforts sponsored by the Naval Air Systems Command, AIR-4.5. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
